alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 2:56AM CST until November 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches with 7 to 11 inches over northern Iron County. * WHERE...Bayfield, Ashland, Iron, Washburn and Sawyer Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band, the Bad River Reservation and the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snowfall will be heaviest this afternoon and evening. Blowing snow will be possible late afternoon into tonight, especially closer to Lake Superior.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
